body_html:
Thanks for the report. This smells like a double free of GPU memory.

Can you confirm this ran fine on the Titan X when run in exactly the same environment (code version, dependencies, CUDA version, NVIDIA driver, etc)?

body:
Thanks for the report. This smells like a double free of GPU memory.

Can you confirm this ran fine on the Titan X when run in exactly the same environment (code version, dependencies, CUDA version, NVIDIA driver, etc)?
